verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* also came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, thou \w dwellest|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of a \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, which have \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* not; they have \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* not: for they \add are\add* a \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

Therefore, thou \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w* for \w removing|strong="H1473"\w*, and \w remove|strong="H1540"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w* in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*; and thou shalt \w remove|strong="H1540"\w* from thy \w place|strong="H4725"\w* to \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*: it may be they will \w consider|strong="H7200"\w*, though they \add be\add* a \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 12.3 \ft stuff: or, instruments\f*

Then shalt thou bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* thy \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w* in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, as \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w* for \w removing|strong="H1473"\w*: and thou shalt go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* at \w even|strong="H6153"\w* in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, as they that go \w forth|strong="H4161"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*.\f + \fr 12.4 \ft as they…: Heb. as the goings forth of captivity\f*
\w Dig|strong="H2864"\w* thou through the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, and carry \w out|strong="H3318"\w* thereby.\f + \fr 12.5 \ft Dig…: Heb. Dig for thee\f*

In their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* shalt thou \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \add it\add* upon \add thy\add* \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w*, \add and\add* carry \add it\add* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w twilight|strong="H5939"\w*: thou shalt \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, that thou \w see|strong="H7200"\w* not the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: for I have \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thee \add for\add* a \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And I \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so as I was \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: I brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* my \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, as \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w* for \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, and in the \w even|strong="H6153"\w* I \w digged|strong="H2864"\w* through the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* with mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; I brought \add it\add* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w twilight|strong="H5939"\w*, \add and\add* I \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* \add it\add* upon \add my\add* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* in their \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 12.7 \ft digged: Heb. digged for me\f*
¶ And in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, hath not the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee, What \w doest|strong="H6213"\w* thou?

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* thou unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; This \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* \add concerneth\add* the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that \add are\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* your \w sign|strong="H4159"\w*: like as I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, so shall it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto them: they shall \w remove|strong="H1473"\w* \add and\add* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*.\f + \fr 12.11 \ft they…: Heb. by removing go into captivity\f*

And the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* that \add is\add* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* upon \add his\add* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* in the \w twilight|strong="H5939"\w*, and shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*: they shall \w dig|strong="H2864"\w* through the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* to carry \w out|strong="H3318"\w* thereby: he shall \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H3282"\w* he \w see|strong="H7200"\w* not the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* with \add his\add* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

My \w net|strong="H7568"\w* also will I \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* upon him, and he shall be \w taken|strong="H8610"\w* in my \w snare|strong="H4686"\w*: and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \add to\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*; yet shall he not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* it, though he shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* there.

And I will \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* toward every \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* all that \add are\add* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him to \w help|strong="H5828"\w* him, and all his \w bands|strong="H0102"\w*; and I will draw \w out|strong="H7324"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them.

And they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I shall \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* them among the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and \w disperse|strong="H2219"\w* them in the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.

But I will \w leave|strong="H3498"\w* a \w few|strong="H4557"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of them from the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, from the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and from the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*; that they may \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* all their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* whither they \w come|strong="H0935"\w*; and they shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 12.16 \ft a few…: Heb. men of number\f*
¶ Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* with \w quaking|strong="H7494"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* thy \w water|strong="H4325"\w* with \w trembling|strong="H7269"\w* and with \w carefulness|strong="H1674"\w*;

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \add and\add* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; They shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* their \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* with \w carefulness|strong="H1674"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* their \w water|strong="H4325"\w* with \w astonishment|strong="H8078"\w*, that her \w land|strong="H0776"\w* may be \w desolate|strong="H3456"\w* from all that is \w therein|strong="H4393"\w*, because of the \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* of all them that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.\f + \fr 12.19 \ft all that…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*

And the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* that are \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* shall be laid \w waste|strong="H2717"\w*, and the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
¶ And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, what \add is\add* that \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* \add that\add* ye have in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w days|strong="H3117"\w* are \w prolonged|strong="H0748"\w*, and every \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w faileth|strong="H0006"\w*?

\w Tell|strong="H0559"\w* them therefore, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will make this \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w*, and they shall no more use it as a \w proverb|strong="H4911"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; but \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto them, The \w days|strong="H3117"\w* are at \w hand|strong="H7126"\w*, and the \w effect|strong="H1697"\w* of every \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*.

For there shall be no more any \w vain|strong="H7723"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* nor \w flattering|strong="H2509"\w* \w divination|strong="H4738"\w* \w within|strong="H8432"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: I will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, and the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that I shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* shall come to \w pass|strong="H6213"\w*; it shall be no more \w prolonged|strong="H4900"\w*: for in your \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, O \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, will I \w say|strong="H1696"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, and will \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* it, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.
¶ Again the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, behold, \add they of\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* that he \w seeth|strong="H2372"\w* \add is\add* for \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add to come\add*, and he \w prophesieth|strong="H5012"\w* of the \w times|strong="H6256"\w* \add that are\add* \w far|strong="H7350"\w* off.

Therefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*; There shall none of my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* be \w prolonged|strong="H4900"\w* any more, but the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which I have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* shall be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.
